rules_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
[i]Augmented[/i] – If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put two of those cards into your hand instead.
flavor_text: [i]“Last night, I had this dream about you.”[/i]
